Memorial Day.  Both my Granddads survived WW2. My Step-dad and my Uncle both made it through Vietnam. My closest friends from the Army, some of whom had MULTIPLE combat deployments, are all still alive today. 

So I feel lucky that this Holiday is not TOO personal for me, buy it
